This file is a merged representation of the entire codebase, combined into a single document by Repomix.

================================================================
File Summary
================================================================

Purpose:
--------
This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.
It is designed to be easily consumable by AI systems for analysis, code review,
or other automated processes.

File Format:
------------
The content is organized as follows:
1. This summary section
2. Repository information
3. Directory structure
4. Multiple file entries, each consisting of:
  a. A separator line (================)
  b. The file path (File: path/to/file)
  c. Another separator line
  d. The full contents of the file
  e. A blank line

Usage Guidelines:
-----------------
- This file should be treated as read-only. Any changes should be made to the
  original repository files, not this packed version.
- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.
- Be aware that this file may contain sensitive information. Handle it with
  the same level of security as you would the original repository.

Notes:
------
- Some files may have been excluded based on .gitignore rules and Repomix's configuration
- Binary files are not included in this packed representation. Please refer to the Repository Structure section for a complete list of file paths, including binary files
- Files matching patterns in .gitignore are excluded
- Files matching default ignore patterns are excluded

Additional Info:
----------------

================================================================
Directory Structure
================================================================
contact.html
index.html
pricing.html
script.js
styles.css

================================================================
Files
================================================================

================
File: contact.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Contact - Anna Healthcare AI</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Get in touch with Anna's team. Schedule a demo to see how our AI healthcare assistant can transform your Medicare Advantage plan.">
    
    <!-- Font Awesome for Icons -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    
    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    
    <!-- Custom CSS -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>

                <!-- Contact Form -->

                    <div class="form-header">
                        <h2>Request Your Demo</h2>
                        <p>Fill out the form below and our team will contact you within 24 hours.</p>
                    </div>

                                <span class="form-error" id="email-error"></span>
                            </div>

                                <span class="form-error" id="phone-error"></span>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <label for="company">Organization *</label>
                            <input type="text" id="company" name="company" required>
                            <span class="form-error" id="company-error"></span>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="form-row">
                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="title">Job Title *</label>

                                <span class="form-error" id="title-error"></span>
                            </div>

                                <label for="members">Number of Members *</label>
                                <input type="number" id="members" name="members" min="1000" required>
                                <span class="form-error" id="members-error"></span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="interest">Areas of Interest</label>
                            <select id="interest" name="interest">
                                <option value="">Select primary interest</option>
                                <option value="star-ratings">STAR Rating Improvement</option>

                                <option value="risk-adjustment">Risk Adjustment</option>
                                <option value="all">All of the Above</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>

                            <label for="message">Tell us about your challenges (optional)</label>
                            <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" placeholder="What specific challenges is your MA plan facing?"></textarea>
                        </div>

                            <i class="fas fa-calendar-check"></i>
                            Schedule Demo
                        </button>
                    </form>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Contact Information -->
                <div class="contact-info">
                    <div class="info-card">
                        <h3><i class="fas fa-clock"></i> What to Expect</h3>
                        <p>After submitting your request:</p>
                        <ul class="timeline">
                            <li>
                                <strong>Within 24 hours:</strong> Our team will reach out to schedule your demo
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>30-minute demo:</strong> See Anna in action with your specific use cases
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Custom analysis:</strong> Receive a personalized ROI projection for your plan
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Pilot program:</strong> Start with a small member subset to prove value
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="info-card">
                        <h3><i class="fas fa-phone-alt"></i> Other Ways to Connect</h3>

                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="info-card">
                        <h3><i class="fas fa-comments"></i> Frequently Asked Questions</h3>
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <strong>How quickly can we implement Anna?</strong>
                            <p>Most plans go live within 4-6 weeks, including EHR integration and testing.</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <strong>What EHR systems do you support?</strong>
                            <p>We integrate with all major EHR systems including Epic, Cerner, Allscripts, and others via FHIR standards.</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-item">
                            <strong>Is there a minimum member requirement?</strong>
                            <p>Our pilot program starts at 1,000 members, with full deployment typically at 5,000+.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

================
File: index.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Anna - AI Healthcare Assistant for Medicare Advantage</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Anna is an AI-powered healthcare assistant that helps Medicare Advantage plans improve member engagement through intelligent SMS and voice conversations.">
    
    <!-- Font Awesome for Icons -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    
    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    
    <!-- Custom CSS -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <nav class="navbar">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="nav-wrapper">
                <a href="index.html" class="logo">
                    <span class="logo-text">Anna</span>
                    <span class="logo-dot">.</span>
                    <span class="logo-tagline">by Tevere Tech</span>
                </a>
                
                <div class="nav-menu">
                    <a href="#demo" class="nav-link">Product Demo</a>
                    <a href="#features" class="nav-link">Features</a>
                    <a href="#how-it-works" class="nav-link">How It Works</a>
                    <a href="#use-cases" class="nav-link">Use Cases</a>
                    <a href="#pilot" class="nav-link">Pilot Program</a>
                    <a href="contact.html" class="nav-link nav-cta">Get Early Access</a>
                </div>
                
                <button class="mobile-toggle" aria-label="Toggle menu">
                    <span></span>
                    <span></span>
                    <span></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="hero">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="hero-content">
                <div class="hero-text">
                    <div class="hero-badge">
                        <i class="fas fa-rocket"></i>
                        <span>Now Accepting Pilot Partners</span>
                    </div>
                    <h1>Revolutionize Medicare Advantage Member Engagement with AI</h1>
                    <p class="hero-description">
                        Anna is an intelligent healthcare assistant that engages your Medicare Advantage members through personalized SMS and voice conversations, helping close care gaps, improve medication adherence, and enhance STAR ratings.
                    </p>
                    <div class="hero-value-props">
                        <div class="value-prop">
                            <i class="fas fa-comments"></i>
                            <span>24/7 Member Support</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="value-prop">
                            <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i>
                            <span>STAR Rating Focused</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="value-prop">
                            <i class="fas fa-shield-alt"></i>
                            <span>HIPAA Compliant</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="hero-actions">
                        <a href="#demo" class="btn btn-primary">See Live Demo</a>
                        <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-secondary">
                            <i class="fas fa-calendar"></i>
                            Join Pilot Program
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="hero-visual">
                    <div class="hero-mockup">
                        <i class="fas fa-comments"></i>
                        <h3>Intelligent Healthcare Conversations</h3>
                        <p>See how Anna engages with members to improve outcomes</p>
                        <a href="#demo" class="btn btn-white">View Live Demos</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Live Demo Section -->
    <section id="demo" class="demo-section">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="section-header">
                <span class="section-label">See Anna in Action</span>
                <h2>Real Conversations, Real Impact</h2>
                <p>Experience how Anna engages with Medicare Advantage members to improve health outcomes</p>
            </div>
            
            <div class="demo-container">
                <div class="demo-tabs">
                    <button class="demo-tab active" data-demo="medication">Medication Adherence</button>
                    <button class="demo-tab" data-demo="screening">Preventive Screening</button>
                    <button class="demo-tab" data-demo="appointment">Appointment Scheduling</button>
                    <button class="demo-tab" data-demo="chronic">Chronic Care Check-in</button>
                </div>
                
                <div class="demo-content">
                    <div class="demo-scenario active" id="medication-demo">
                        <div class="scenario-header">
                            <h3>Medication Refill Reminder</h3>
                            <p>Anna identifies members due for refills and proactively reaches out</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="chat-demo">
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Hi Robert! This is Anna from your Medicare plan. I noticed your blood pressure medication (Lisinopril) is due for a refill. Would you like me to help arrange that with your pharmacy?</div>
                                <span class="time">2:15 PM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">I've been feeling fine lately. Do I still need to take it?</div>
                                <span class="time">2:18 PM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">It's great that you're feeling well! That often means your medication is working effectively. Blood pressure medications work preventively - stopping them can lead to complications even if you feel fine. Would you like to discuss this with your doctor first, or shall I go ahead with the refill?</div>
                                <span class="time">2:18 PM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">Ok that makes sense. Please refill it.</div>
                                <span class="time">2:20 PM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Perfect! I've sent the refill request to CVS on Main Street. It will be ready for pickup tomorrow after 10 AM. I'll text you a reminder. Is there anything else I can help you with today?</div>
                                <span class="time">2:20 PM</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="demo-impact">
                            <h4>Impact on Your Plan:</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Improves medication adherence rates (key STAR measure)</li>
                                <li>Prevents complications from discontinued medications</li>
                                <li>Reduces inbound calls to your care management team</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="demo-scenario" id="screening-demo">
                        <div class="scenario-header">
                            <h3>Preventive Care Outreach</h3>
                            <p>Anna helps close care gaps by scheduling overdue screenings</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="chat-demo">
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Hello Maria! This is Anna from your Medicare plan. Our records show you're due for your annual mammogram. This is an important preventive screening covered 100% by your plan. Would you like me to help you schedule it?</div>
                                <span class="time">10:30 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">Yes, I keep forgetting to schedule that</div>
                                <span class="time">10:45 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">No problem, I'm here to help! I can see that Regional Medical Center and Women's Health Clinic both have availability this week. Which location would you prefer?</div>
                                <span class="time">10:45 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">Women's Health Clinic is closer to me</div>
                                <span class="time">10:47 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Great choice! They have openings on Thursday at 9 AM or Friday at 2 PM. Which works better for your schedule?</div>
                                <span class="time">10:47 AM</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="demo-impact">
                            <h4>Impact on Your Plan:</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Closes care gaps that directly impact STAR ratings</li>
                                <li>Increases preventive screening completion rates</li>
                                <li>Identifies cancers and conditions early when treatment is most effective</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="demo-scenario" id="appointment-demo">
                        <div class="scenario-header">
                            <h3>Annual Wellness Visit Scheduling</h3>
                            <p>Anna ensures members complete their important annual check-ups</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="chat-demo">
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Hi James! This is Anna from your Medicare plan. It's time for your Annual Wellness Visit - a comprehensive check-up that's completely free with your plan. This visit helps your doctor create a personalized prevention plan. Can I help schedule this for you?</div>
                                <span class="time">3:00 PM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">What does that include?</div>
                                <span class="time">3:15 PM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Great question! Your Annual Wellness Visit includes: review of your medical history, checking vital signs like blood pressure, discussing preventive services you may need, updating your medication list, and creating a plan to keep you healthy. It typically takes about 30-45 minutes. Would you like to schedule it with Dr. Thompson?</div>
                                <span class="time">3:15 PM</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="demo-impact">
                            <h4>Impact on Your Plan:</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Increases Annual Wellness Visit completion (STAR measure)</li>
                                <li>Helps identify new conditions for proper risk adjustment</li>
                                <li>Strengthens member-provider relationships</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="demo-scenario" id="chronic-demo">
                        <div class="scenario-header">
                            <h3>Chronic Condition Management</h3>
                            <p>Anna provides ongoing support for members with chronic conditions</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="chat-demo">
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Good morning Susan! This is Anna checking in on your diabetes management. How have your blood sugar levels been this week?</div>
                                <span class="time">9:00 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">They've been running a bit high, around 180-200</div>
                                <span class="time">9:10 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">Thank you for sharing that. Those levels are higher than your target range. Have you been taking your Metformin as prescribed? Any changes to your diet or activity level recently?</div>
                                <span class="time">9:10 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message user">
                                <div class="message">I've been stressed and eating more. Also forgot my medicine a few times</div>
                                <span class="time">9:12 AM</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="chat-message bot">
                                <div class="avatar">A</div>
                                <div class="message">I understand - stress can definitely affect blood sugar. Would you like me to: 1) Set up daily medication reminders on your phone? 2) Schedule a visit with your diabetes educator for stress management tips? 3) Connect you with our nutritionist for meal planning support? Any or all of these could help!</div>
                                <span class="time">9:12 AM</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="demo-impact">
                            <h4>Impact on Your Plan:</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Reduces hospital admissions and ER visits</li>
                                <li>Improves diabetes care metrics (HbA1c control)</li>
                                <li>Provides early intervention before conditions worsen</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Features Section -->
    <section id="features" class="features-section">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="section-header">
                <span class="section-label">Comprehensive Platform</span>
                <h2>Built Specifically for Medicare Advantage Success</h2>
                <p>Every feature is designed to improve STAR ratings and member outcomes</p>
            </div>
            
            <div class="features-grid">
                <div class="feature-card">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-brain"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>AI-Powered Conversations</h3>
                    <p>Natural language processing understands member responses and provides contextually appropriate follow-ups</p>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>Handles complex medical discussions</li>
                        <li>Recognizes urgency and escalates appropriately</li>
                        <li>Learns from each interaction</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="feature-card">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-hospital"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>EHR Integration</h3>
                    <p>Seamlessly connects with your existing systems to access member data and update records</p>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>FHIR-compliant integration</li>
                        <li>Real-time data synchronization</li>
                        <li>Works with Epic, Cerner, and others</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="feature-card">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-mobile-alt"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>Omnichannel Outreach</h3>
                    <p>Reaches members through their preferred communication channel</p>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>SMS text messaging</li>
                        <li>Voice calls with natural speech</li>
                        <li>Integration with member portals</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="feature-card">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-chart-bar"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>Analytics Dashboard</h3>
                    <p>Track engagement metrics and measure impact on quality measures</p>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>Real-time engagement tracking</li>
                        <li>HEDIS measure progress</li>
                        <li>ROI measurement tools</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="feature-card">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-lock"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>Security & Compliance</h3>
                    <p>Built with healthcare security requirements from day one</p>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>HIPAA compliant infrastructure</li>
                        <li>SOC 2 Type II certified</li>
                        <li>End-to-end encryption</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="feature-card">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-users-cog"></i>
                    </div>
                    <h3>Care Team Integration</h3>
                    <p>Enhances your existing care management workflows</p>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>Automated escalation protocols</li>
                        <li>Care team dashboards</li>
                        <li>Seamless handoffs when needed</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- How It Works Section -->
    <section id="how-it-works" class="how-it-works">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="section-header">
                <span class="section-label">Implementation Process</span>
                <h2>Get Started in Weeks, Not Months</h2>
                <p>Our streamlined implementation process gets you up and running quickly</p>
            </div>
            
            <div class="process-timeline">
                <div class="process-step">
                    <div class="step-number">1</div>
                    <div class="step-content">
                        <h3>Discovery & Planning</h3>
                        <span class="step-duration">Week 1-2</span>
                        <p>We analyze your member population, identify key use cases, and create a customized implementation plan</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="process-step">
                    <div class="step-number">2</div>
                    <div class="step-content">
                        <h3>EHR Integration</h3>
                        <span class="step-duration">Week 2-3</span>
                        <p>Connect Anna to your existing systems using FHIR standards for secure data exchange</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="process-step">
                    <div class="step-number">3</div>
                    <div class="step-content">
                        <h3>Configuration & Testing</h3>
                        <span class="step-duration">Week 3-4</span>
                        <p>Customize messaging, set up workflows, and test with a small member cohort</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="process-step">
                    <div class="step-number">4</div>
                    <div class="step-content">
                        <h3>Pilot Launch</h3>
                        <span class="step-duration">Week 5-6</span>
                        <p>Begin with targeted member populations and monitor engagement metrics</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="process-step">
                    <div class="step-number">5</div>
                    <div class="step-content">
                        <h3>Scale & Optimize</h3>
                        <span class="step-duration">Ongoing</span>
                        <p>Expand to full member base while continuously optimizing based on results</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Use Cases Section -->
    <section id="use-cases" class="use-cases">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="section-header">
                <span class="section-label">Proven Use Cases</span>
                <h2>Address Your Most Critical Challenges</h2>
                <p>Anna tackles the issues that matter most to Medicare Advantage plans</p>
            </div>
            
            <div class="use-cases-grid">
                <div class="use-case">
                    <div class="use-case-header">
                        <i class="fas fa-star"></i>
                        <h3>STAR Rating Improvement</h3>
                    </div>
                    <p>Target specific HEDIS and CAHPS measures with automated outreach campaigns</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Medication adherence (diabetes, hypertension, cholesterol)</li>
                        <li>Breast cancer screening</li>
                        <li>Colorectal cancer screening</li>
                        <li>Annual flu vaccine</li>
                        <li>Care for older adults</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="use-case">
                    <div class="use-case-header">
                        <i class="fas fa-dollar-sign"></i>
                        <h3>Cost Reduction</h3>
                    </div>
                    <p>Prevent expensive acute events through proactive engagement</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Reduce ER visits through symptom triage</li>
                        <li>Prevent readmissions with post-discharge follow-up</li>
                        <li>Avoid complications through medication adherence</li>
                        <li>Decrease call center volume</li>
                        <li>Automate routine member outreach</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="use-case">
                    <div class="use-case-header">
                        <i class="fas fa-clipboard-check"></i>
                        <h3>Risk Adjustment</h3>
                    </div>
                    <p>Identify and document conditions through intelligent conversations</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Surface unreported diagnoses</li>
                        <li>Prompt annual HCC validations</li>
                        <li>Schedule provider visits for suspected conditions</li>
                        <li>Document social determinants of health</li>
                        <li>Track condition progression</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Pilot Program Section -->
    <section id="pilot" class="pilot-section">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="section-header">
                <span class="section-label">Limited Opportunity</span>
                <h2>Join Our Exclusive Pilot Program</h2>
                <p>Be among the first Medicare Advantage plans to leverage Anna's capabilities</p>
            </div>
            
            <div class="pilot-content">
                <div class="pilot-benefits">
                    <h3>Pilot Partner Benefits</h3>

                            <i class="fas fa-hand-holding-usd"></i>

                        </div>
                        <div class="pilot-benefit">
                            <i class="fas fa-concierge-bell"></i>

                        </div>
                        <div class="pilot-benefit">
                            <i class="fas fa-code-branch"></i>
                            <h4>Shape the Product</h4>
                            <p>Direct input on features and roadmap based on your needs</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="pilot-benefit">
                            <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i>
                            <h4>Prove ROI First</h4>
                            <p>Start with high-impact use cases to demonstrate value quickly</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="pilot-requirements">
                    <h3>Ideal Pilot Partners</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Regional Medicare Advantage plans with 5,000-100,000 members</li>
                        <li>Committed to improving STAR ratings and member experience</li>
                        <li>Have basic EHR integration capabilities (Epic, Cerner, etc.)</li>
                        <li>Willing to start with a focused member segment (e.g., diabetics)</li>
                        <li>Can provide feedback and collaborate on optimization</li>
                    </ul>
                    <div class="pilot-cta">
                        <p><strong>Only 5 pilot slots remaining</strong> for Q1 2025</p>
                        <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Apply for Pilot Program</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- FAQ Section -->
    <section class="faq-section">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="section-header">
                <span class="section-label">Common Questions</span>
                <h2>Frequently Asked Questions</h2>
            </div>
            
            <div class="faq-grid">
                <div class="faq-item">
                    <h3>How does billing work?</h3>
                    <p>We bill monthly based on your active member count. You only pay for members who receive at least one engagement from Anna each month.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-item">
                    <h3>Can we customize the messaging?</h3>
                    <p>Absolutely. Anna's conversations are fully customizable to match your brand voice and specific clinical protocols.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-item">
                    <h3>What about members without smartphones?</h3>
                    <p>Anna works with basic SMS text messaging and voice calls, reaching 98% of Medicare beneficiaries.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-item">
                    <h3>How long does implementation take?</h3>
                    <p>Most plans go live within 4-6 weeks, including EHR integration, testing, and staff training.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-item">
                    <h3>Is there a contract minimum?</h3>
                    <p>Pilot programs require a 3-month commitment. Full deployments are typically annual contracts with monthly billing.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-item">
                    <h3>Can we start with a specific population?</h3>
                    <p>Yes! Many plans start with high-risk diabetics or members with multiple chronic conditions to prove ROI quickly.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- CTA Section -->
    <section class="cta-section">
        <div class="container">

                <h2>Ready to See the Numbers for Your Plan?</h2>

================
File: script.js
================
// Anna Healthcare AI - Main JavaScript File

// DOM Elements
const navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');
const mobileToggle = document.querySelector('.mobile-toggle');
const navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');

// Mobile Navigation
if (mobileToggle) {
    mobileToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        mobileToggle.classList.toggle('active');
        navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
    });
}

// Close mobile menu when clicking on a link
navLinks.forEach(link => {
    link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        mobileToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navMenu.classList.remove('active');
    });
});

// Navbar Scroll Effect
window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
    const currentScroll = window.pageYOffset;
    
    if (currentScroll > 100) {
        navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
    } else {
        navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
    }
});

// Smooth Scrolling for Anchor Links
document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
    anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
        
        if (target) {
            const navbarHeight = navbar.offsetHeight;
            const targetPosition = target.offsetTop - navbarHeight - 20;
            
            window.scrollTo({
                top: targetPosition,
                behavior: 'smooth'
            });
        }
    });
});

// Demo Tab Functionality
const demoTabs = document.querySelectorAll('.demo-tab');
const demoScenarios = document.querySelectorAll('.demo-scenario');

demoTabs.forEach(tab => {
    tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const demoType = tab.dataset.demo;
        
        // Update active tab
        demoTabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
        tab.classList.add('active');
        
        // Show corresponding scenario
        demoScenarios.forEach(scenario => {
            scenario.classList.remove('active');
        });
        
        const activeScenario = document.getElementById(`${demoType}-demo`);
        if (activeScenario) {
            activeScenario.classList.add('active');
            
            // Animate chat messages
            const messages = activeScenario.querySelectorAll('.chat-message');
            messages.forEach((message, index) => {
                message.style.opacity = '0';
                message.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    message.style.transition = 'all 0.4s ease';
                    message.style.opacity = '1';
                    message.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                }, index * 300);
            });
        }
    });
});

// Pricing Toggle (removed since we're not showing pricing)
// ROI Calculator (removed since we don't have real data yet)

// Contact Form Handling
const contactForm = document.getElementById('contact-form');

if (contactForm) {
    contactForm.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        
        // Clear previous errors
        document.querySelectorAll('.form-error').forEach(error => {
            error.textContent = '';
        });
        
        // Get form data
        const formData = new FormData(contactForm);
        const data = Object.fromEntries(formData);
        
        // Basic validation
        const errors = {};
        
        if (!data.name || data.name.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.name = 'Please enter your full name';
        }
        
        if (!data.email || !isValidEmail(data.email)) {
            errors.email = 'Please enter a valid email address';
        }
        
        if (!data.company || data.company.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.company = 'Please enter your organization name';
        }
        
        if (!data.title || data.title.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.title = 'Please enter your job title';
        }
        
        if (!data.members || data.members < 1000) {
            errors.members = 'Minimum 1,000 members required for pilot program';
        }
        
        // Display errors if any
        if (Object.keys(errors).length > 0) {
            Object.keys(errors).forEach(field => {
                const errorElement = document.getElementById(`${field}-error`);
                if (errorElement) {
                    errorElement.textContent = errors[field];
                }
            });
            return;
        }
        
        // Show loading state
        const submitButton = contactForm.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
        const originalText = submitButton.textContent;
        submitButton.textContent = 'Sending...';
        submitButton.classList.add('loading');
        submitButton.disabled = true;
        
        // Simulate form submission (replace with actual API call)
        try {
            await simulateFormSubmission(data);
            
            // Show success message
            contactForm.innerHTML = `
                <div class="success-message">
                    <i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i>
                    <h3>Thank You for Your Interest!</h3>
                    <p>We've received your pilot program application. Our team will review your information and contact you within 24-48 hours to discuss next steps.</p>
                    <p>In the meantime, feel free to explore our live demos and documentation.</p>
                </div>
            `;
        } catch (error) {
            // Reset button
            submitButton.textContent = originalText;
            submitButton.classList.remove('loading');
            submitButton.disabled = false;
            
            // Show error message
            alert('There was an error submitting your request. Please try again or contact us directly at pilot@anna-health.com');
        }
    });
}

// Helper Functions
function isValidEmail(email) {
    const re = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
    return re.test(email);
}

async function simulateFormSubmission(data) {
    // Simulate API call delay
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
        setTimeout(resolve, 2000);
    });
}

// Intersection Observer for Animations
const observerOptions = {
    threshold: 0.1,
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -100px 0px'
};

const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            entry.target.classList.add('visible');
            
            // Add staggered animation to children
            const children = entry.target.querySelectorAll('.animate-child');
            children.forEach((child, index) => {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    child.classList.add('visible');
                }, index * 100);
            });
        }
    });
}, observerOptions);

// Observe elements with animation classes
document.querySelectorAll('.animate-fade-in, .animate-slide-left, .animate-slide-right').forEach(el => {
    observer.observe(el);
});

// Feature Cards Hover Effect
const featureCards = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-card, .use-case, .pilot-benefit');

featureCards.forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
        this.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px)';
    });
    
    card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
        this.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
    });
});

// Demo Preview Video Play Button
const demoPreview = document.querySelector('.demo-preview');
if (demoPreview) {
    demoPreview.addEventListener('click', () => {
        // In a real implementation, this would open a video modal
        alert('Video demo coming soon! For now, explore the interactive demos below.');
    });
}

// Process Timeline Animation
const processSteps = document.querySelectorAll('.process-step');
const processObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
    entries.forEach((entry, index) => {
        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                entry.target.classList.add('visible');
            }, index * 200);
        }
    });
}, { threshold: 0.3 });

processSteps.forEach(step => {
    processObserver.observe(step);
});

// Active Navigation Highlighting
function highlightActiveSection() {
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section[id]');
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
    
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
        let current = '';
        
        sections.forEach(section => {
            const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
            const sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;
            
            if (window.pageYOffset >= sectionTop - 200) {
                current = section.getAttribute('id');
            }
        });
        
        navLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.classList.remove('active');
            
            if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${current}`) {
                link.classList.add('active');
            }
        });
    });
}

// Initialize active section highlighting
highlightActiveSection();

// Add Chat Message Typing Effect
function typeMessage(element, text, callback) {
    let index = 0;
    element.textContent = '';
    
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
        if (index < text.length) {
            element.textContent += text[index];
            index++;
        } else {
            clearInterval(interval);
            if (callback) callback();
        }
    }, 20);
}

// Initialize first demo on page load
window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const firstTab = document.querySelector('.demo-tab.active');
    if (firstTab) {
        firstTab.click();
    }
});

// Performance Optimization - Debounce scroll events
function debounce(func, wait) {
    let timeout;
    return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
            clearTimeout(timeout);
            func(...args);
        };
        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
    };
}

// Apply debounce to scroll-based functions
window.addEventListener('scroll', debounce(() => {
    // Navbar scroll effect
    const currentScroll = window.pageYOffset;
    if (currentScroll > 100) {
        navbar.classList.add('scrolled');
    } else {
        navbar.classList.remove('scrolled');
    }
}, 10));

================
File: styles.css
================
/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

:root {
    /* Colors */
    --primary: #5B21B6;
    --primary-dark: #4C1D95;
    --primary-light: #7C3AED;
    --secondary: #059669;
    --secondary-dark: #047857;
    --accent: #F59E0B;
    --success: #10B981;
    --error: #EF4444;
    --dark: #111827;
    --gray-dark: #374151;
    --gray: #6B7280;
    --gray-light: #9CA3AF;
    --light-gray: #F3F4F6;
    --lighter-gray: #F9FAFB;
    --white: #FFFFFF;
    
    /* Typography */
    --font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
    --font-size-xs: 0.75rem;
    --font-size-sm: 0.875rem;
    --font-size-base: 1rem;
    --font-size-lg: 1.125rem;
    --font-size-xl: 1.25rem;
    --font-size-2xl: 1.5rem;
    --font-size-3xl: 1.875rem;
    --font-size-4xl: 2.25rem;
    --font-size-5xl: 3rem;
    
    /* Spacing */
    --spacing-xs: 0.5rem;
    --spacing-sm: 1rem;
    --spacing-md: 1.5rem;
    --spacing-lg: 2rem;
    --spacing-xl: 3rem;
    --spacing-2xl: 4rem;
    --spacing-3xl: 6rem;
    
    /* Shadows */
    --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    --shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    --shadow-xl: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
    
    /* Border Radius */
    --radius-sm: 0.25rem;
    --radius: 0.375rem;
    --radius-md: 0.5rem;
    --radius-lg: 0.75rem;
    --radius-xl: 1rem;
    --radius-2xl: 1.5rem;
    --radius-full: 9999px;
    
    /* Transitions */
    --transition-fast: 150ms ease;
    --transition: 200ms ease;
    --transition-slow: 300ms ease;
}

/* Base Styles */
html {
    font-size: 16px;
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
    font-family: var(--font-family);
    font-size: var(--font-size-base);
    line-height: 1.6;
    color: var(--gray-dark);
    background-color: var(--white);
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 1.2;
    color: var(--dark);
}

    font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3rem);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

    font-size: clamp(1.5rem, 4vw, 2.25rem);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

    font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 3vw, 1.5rem);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
}

    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
    color: var(--gray);
}

    color: var(--primary);
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: color var(--transition);
}

    color: var(--primary-dark);
}

}

}

    display: block;

    border-left: 4px solid var(--primary);
    padding: var(--spacing-md);
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}

    color: var(--primary);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
}

    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
}

    padding-left: 1.5rem;
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
    color: var(--gray-dark);
}

    content: '→';
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    color: var(--primary);
    font-weight: 700;
}

/* Features Section */
.features-section {
    padding: var(--spacing-3xl) 0;
    background-color: var(--lighter-gray);
}

.features-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
    gap: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.feature-card {
    background-color: var(--white);
    padding: var(--spacing-xl);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow);
    transition: all var(--transition);
    border: 1px solid transparent;
}

.feature-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
    border-color: var(--primary);
}

.feature-icon {
    width: 48px;
    height: 48px;
    background-color: var(--light-gray);
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

.feature-icon i {
    font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
    color: var(--primary);
}

.feature-list {
    list-style: none;
    margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
    padding: 0;
}

.feature-list li {
    padding-left: 1.25rem;
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    color: var(--gray);
}

.feature-list li::before {
    content: '✓';
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    color: var(--success);
    font-weight: 700;
}

/* How It Works Section */
.how-it-works {
    padding: var(--spacing-3xl) 0;
    background-color: var(--white);
}

.process-timeline {
    position: relative;
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.process-timeline::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 39px;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 2px;
    background-color: var(--light-gray);
}

.process-step {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--spacing-lg);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
    position: relative;
}

.step-number {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    background-color: var(--primary);
    color: var(--white);
    border-radius: var(--radius-full);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-weight: 700;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow);
}

.step-content {
    flex: 1;
    background-color: var(--lighter-gray);
    padding: var(--spacing-lg);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    border: 1px solid var(--light-gray);
}

.step-duration {
    display: inline-block;
    background-color: var(--light-gray);
    padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: var(--radius-full);
    font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--gray);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
}

}

}

}

    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
}

    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

    display: block;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--dark);
    margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
}

.form-group select,

    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    border: 2px solid var(--light-gray);
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    font-size: var(--font-size-base);
    transition: all var(--transition);
}

.form-group select:focus,
.form-group textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: var(--primary);
}

    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: var(--spacing-md);
}

    color: var(--error);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    margin-top: 0.25rem;
}

    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: var(--spacing-lg);
}

}

    align-items: center;

}

    color: var(--primary);
}

    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
}

}

}

    content: '';

    top: 0;
    width: 10px;
    height: 10px;

}

}

    color: var(--primary);
}

/* Loading State */
.loading {
    position: relative;
    pointer-events: none;
}

.loading::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    margin: -8px 0 0 -8px;
    border: 2px solid var(--primary);
    border-top-color: transparent;
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 0.8s linear infinite;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fadeInUp {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

@keyframes spin {
    to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
    .hero-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        text-align: center;
    }
    
    .hero-visual {
        margin-top: var(--spacing-xl);
    }
    
    .hero-actions {
        justify-content: center;
    }
    
    .features-grid {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    }
    
    .use-cases-grid {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    }
    
    .pilot-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    .footer-content {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    /* Typography adjustments */
    h1 { font-size: 2rem; }
    h2 { font-size: 1.5rem; }
    h3 { font-size: 1.25rem; }
    
    /* Container padding */
    .container {
        padding: 0 var(--spacing-sm);
    }
    
    /* Navigation */
    .nav-menu {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        top: 100%;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background-color: var(--white);
        flex-direction: column;
        padding: var(--spacing-md);
        box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        border-top: 1px solid var(--light-gray);
    }
    
    .nav-menu.active {
        display: flex;
    }
    
    .mobile-toggle {
        display: flex;
    }
    
    .mobile-toggle.active span:nth-child(1) {
        transform: rotate(45deg) translate(5px, 5px);
    }
    
    .mobile-toggle.active span:nth-child(2) {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    
    .mobile-toggle.active span:nth-child(3) {
        transform: rotate(-45deg) translate(7px, -6px);
    }
    
    /* Hero */
    .hero {
        padding: 100px 0 60px;
    }
    
    .hero-value-props {
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: flex-start;
    }
    
    .hero-actions {
        flex-direction: column;
        width: 100%;
    }
    
    .hero-actions .btn {
        width: 100%;
    }
    
    /* Demo */
    .demo-tabs {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    
    .demo-tab {
        text-align: left;
        padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-md);
    }
    
    .chat-demo {
        padding: var(--spacing-md);
    }
    
    /* Features */
    .features-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    /* Process */
    .process-timeline::before {
        left: 20px;
    }
    
    .step-number {
        width: 32px;
        height: 32px;
        font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    }
    
    /* Use Cases */
    .use-cases-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    /* Pilot */
    .benefit-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    /* CTA */
    .cta-actions {
        flex-direction: column;
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 300px;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }
    
    .cta-actions .btn {
        width: 100%;
    }
    
    /* Footer */
    .footer-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        text-align: center;
    }
    
    /* Contact */
    .contact-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    .form-row {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    /* Trust */
    .trust-wrapper {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        gap: var(--spacing-md);
    }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
    /* Reduce spacing on very small screens */
    :root {
        --spacing-3xl: 4rem;
        --spacing-2xl: 3rem;
        --spacing-xl: 2rem;
    }
    
    .section-header {
        margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2xl);
    }
    
    .demo-content {
        padding: var(--spacing-md);
    }
    
    .pilot-benefits,
    .pilot-requirements {
        padding: var(--spacing-md);
    }
}
